meals.mealName: Smoky Bacon, Potato and Cheddar Hash
meals.description: With melty cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, and golden russet potatoes, our breakfast hash recipe will be your new favorite breakfast!

meals.mealName: Granola with Figs, Almonds and Coconut
meals.description: healthy, filling, delicious alchemy that happens when you combine oats, honey, and oil with some handfuls of chopped nuts and dried fruit into an incredibly easy-to-bake batch of granola.
bread dipped in a batter of egg and milk and sautéed until brown, usually served with syrup or sprinkled with sugar and cinnamon.
Chicken fried rice is the comfort dish of Chinese food with the addition of oil and soy sauce and veggies and meat spruce up the rice for a delicious meal.

It is made with mostly pantry ingredients but includes hearty greens and a squeeze of lemon for bright, fresh flavor. It’s seasoned with a few of my favorite spices and plenty of freshly ground black pepper.
It is a spicy stew containing chili peppers, meat, tomatoes and pinto beans or kidney beans seasoned with garlic, onions, and cumin.
Crispy prosciutto and toasted sourdough bread adds extra crunch to this caesar salad.
A Mexican-inspired zucchini slice up to two days in advance. Gently warm in the oven before serving, then top with the avocado, tomato and sriracha.
For a fast and satisfying Dinner, turn to this fresh tomato and tuna pasta is your way to go
